title: Guided Deep Breathing: Reduce Stress & Be Happy
description:
NEVER DO THIS BREATHWORK SESSION IN WATER
💨 Get my NEW free 15-day breathwork course here: https://kitarowaga.kit.com/15-day-breathwork-course

🤝 Work with Me (Coaching): https://kitarowaga.com/academy

🎓 Get my in-depth Courses: https://kitarowaga.com/courses

🧡 Join my Guided Breathwork Library – a vast collection of all my guided sessions and weekly live guided sessions: https://kitarowaga.com/guided-breathwork-library


--

A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a breathwork coach, Movement practitioner under Ido Portal, and former traditional Kung Fu instructor for 20 years. If you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel.

channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/_XI67KHK5Wo" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: May my whole family see this video someday! No, the whole world! Kids need this in their lives! Think of the difference this would make in school alone everyone! This would be fantastic for kids! Push the envelope guys! Everything starts with education! My goal is to get so used to this method that I can do it without the videos instinctively! We can't rely on videos y'all, but we can rely on ourselves, believe it! From my heart to all of yours out there! Bless up aye! This video needs some more views YouTube!
Thank you for adding this.  4 rounds in a different way to wim hof is a great alternative
Love this guy! He’s so authentic… he’s so real… I think it’s time our buddy Kitaro does a full guided breathing meditation in addition to Wim Hof sessions
This video is saving my life every day. Thanks Kitaro! Thank you Wim! And thanks to all the loving people choosing a better life!
Thank you for another beautiful morning.
